pages.title: Potion Brewing Still
pages.text: The <item>Potion Brewing Still/$ is a machine for brewing potions, as an alternative to the normal brewing stand. It doesn't require blaze powder to brew potions, but uses <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/crossroads)heat/$ instead.$(br2)Like a brewing stand, it can brew three potions at once using 1 item ingredient.

It can be much faster than a normal brewing stand.$(br2)It uses <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/heat)heat/$, and runs faster the closer it is to 100°C. If the temperature exceeds 100°C at all, it totally stops working but still consumes heat, so ideally it should be kept at just slightly below 100°C.$(br2)<thing>$(l:essentials/circuits)Circuits/$ measure the fullness of the
three potion input slots, as a value from 0 to 15.$(br2)
It is useful to note that <thing>Crossroads/$ adds a recipe to fill empty bottles with water by brewing them with ice, as an alternative option to normal bottle filling.$(br2)
